title: Tomorrow’s podcast
author: VD
content_html:
I’m just going to warn you right now, tomorrow’s Voxonomics will be a bit more esoteric than the previous two. But I really enjoyed the interview, I mean, if you’re not genuinely amused at the ironic prospects of what could almost be described as Austrian econometrics, well, you’re probably not in my profoundly miniscule target audience.

Although, if you’re clueless about economics and wonder what the difference between Keynesianism and monetarism is, you may want to consider giving it a whirl anyhow.
content_text:
I’m just going to warn you right now, tomorrow’s Voxonomics will be a bit more esoteric than the previous two.  But I really enjoyed the interview, I mean, if you’re not genuinely amused at the ironic prospects of what could almost be described as Austrian econometrics, well, you’re probably not in my profoundly miniscule target audience.
Although, if you’re clueless about economics and wonder what the difference between Keynesianism and monetarism is, you may want to consider giving it a whirl anyhow.
